Vitamin drops
Infants drinking less than 
500ml (1 pint) or more of 
infant formula each day should 
receive a supplement of 8.5 -10 
micrograms of Vitamin D per 
day throughout the year. See 
pha.site/vitaminD. You can buy 
suitable drops at any pharmacy.
You can continue giving your 
baby infant formula when they 
are olde
